item.title: System monitoring
item.description: I was looking for a system monitoring solution that can notify my in case of abnormal CPU/netowrk/disk usage via email or telegram. It seems there are several popular solutions: Nagios Munin Icinga Spiceworks Monit Cacti Zabbix Glances Monitorix See also: https://askubuntu.com/questions/784781/system-monitoring-with-email-notifications
